info.title: Payroll Service API
info.description: Multi-tenant API powering three major payroll service websites: PaystubsNow.com, CheckstubMaker.com, and TheBestPaystubs.com. The API automatically handles site-specific request scoping based on the calling domain. All endpoints are accessible via the respective staging domains for each site.
